gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Koordination, Geo-Information und Services KOGIS, swisstopo

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Koordination, Geo-Information und Services KOGIS, swisstopo
Coordination, Services et Informations Géographiques (COSIG), swisstopo
Coordinazione, Servizi e Informazioni Geografiche COSIG, swisstopo

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Der Web Access Elevation Service ist ein Konstrukt, der aus zwei Diensten besteht. Einerseits kann mit diesem Dienst eine Höhe (spezifischer Punkt), andererseits ein Profil (Polylinie) abgefragt werden.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Der Web Access Elevation Service ist ein Konstrukt, der aus zwei Diensten besteht. Einerseits kann mit diesem Dienst eine Höhe (spezifischer Punkt), andererseits ein Profil (Polylinie) abgefragt werden.
This service allows to obtain elevation information for a point or a polyline.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: A GeoJSON representation of a polyline (type = LineString).

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: A GeoJSON representation of a polyline (type = LineString).

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The number of points used for the polyline segmentation. Default “200”.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The number of points used for the polyline segmentation. Default “200”.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The offset value (INTEGER) in order to use the exponential moving algorithm . For a given value the offset value specify the number of values before and after used to calculate the average.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The offset value (INTEGER) in order to use the exponential moving algorithm . For a given value the offset value specify the number of values before and after used to calculate the average.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: Only available for profile.json. The name of the callback function.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Only available for profile.json. The name of the callback function.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: A comma separated list of elevation models. Three elevation models are available DTM25, DTM2 (swissALTI3D) and COMB (a combination of DTM25 and DTM2). Default to “DTM25”.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: A comma separated list of elevation models. Three elevation models are available DTM25, DTM2 (swissALTI3D) and COMB (a combination of DTM25 and DTM2). Default to “DTM25”.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The number of points used for the polyline segmentation. Default “200”.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The number of points used for the polyline segmentation. Default “200”.

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The offset value (INTEGER) in order to use the exponential moving algorithm . For a given value the offset value specify the number of values before and after used to calculate the average.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The offset value (INTEGER) in order to use the exponential moving algorithm . For a given value the offset value specify the number of values before and after used to calculate the average.
